name: Super Robot Taisen: Compact
description:
First game of the Compact Trilogy, released on the WonderSwan first, and then, with a few gameplay differences, on the WonderSwan Color.

The cast features robots from the following series:

Daimos Choujuu Kishin Dancougar Dancougar: Requiem for Victims Choujuu Kishin Dancougar: God Bless Dancougar Aura Battler Dunbine Getter Robo Getter Robo G Shin Getter Robo (Manga) Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit ZZ Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Suit Gundam F91 Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Heavy Metal L-Gaim Mazinger Z Great Mazinger Brave Raideen
